specific_question: How many IT infrastructure upgrades were completed in Q4 2024?
answer: Four IT infrastructure upgrades were completed in Q4 2024, with an average cost of $75,000 per upgrade.
justification: IT infrastructure upgrades do not address the core DR Question focus area on chatbots and customer experience
dr_question: How can Lee's Market leverage chatbots to enhance the consumer experience for centennial shoppers?
